synopsis.text: Blu-ray and DVD volume one comes with an exclusive, unaired episode, numbered '2.5', that delves deeper into the conclusion of episode two. In this special episode, the mischievous antics of the boys take center stage as they attempt to sneak a peek at the girls' bath time. This bonus content serves as an exciting extension to the series' main plotline.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
